name: Meng Che Wu
indexDescription: This is the portfolio website of Meng Che Wu, designed for applying as a frontend developer. The personal website is developed and written using Nuxt 3 + Tailwindcss 3 + Vite. The portfolio includes applications of Side projects using Vue 3 + Vite + Bootstrap 5, Tailwindcss3, Element plus, and other UI frameworks. It also features UI interface works from previous jobs, intended for interview purposes.
author: Meng Che Wu
aboutDescription: My name is Meng Che Wu, and I am an UI designer and frontend developer.Dedicated and highly competitive, I approach work with attentiveness, diligence, and a strong sense of responsibility. I am adept at both team collaboration and independent development, and I continuously strive to learn and improve. Currently, I am focusing on enhancing my frontend skills and expanding my comfort zone. I have a strong desire to grow and progress in both design and programming and align myself with the strategic goals of the company.
projectsDescription: The portfolio includes the following projects: Bottigaemo Boutique E-commerce Website developed using Vue 3 - Composition API + Vite + Tailwindcss 3 + GSAP 3, among others. Edomae Zushi Website created with Vue 3 - Options API + Vue CLI + Bootstrap 5. Finedus Content Management System built using Vue 3 - Composition API + Vite + Element Plus. Additionally, the portfolio also features previous UI interface works, which can be showcased during interviews.
contactDescription: My name is Meng Che Wu, and I am applying for the position of Frontend Developer. Thank you for taking the time to view my portfolio and resume. The contact information is provided within the website's content. Please contact me through phone or email, and I will respond to your message as soon as possible. Thank you.
workNotice: Projects are under copyright, so I cannot provide any files and source code on the website.
workWebDescription: During my employment at Iaunty, I continuously optimized and updated the official website to meet the demands. As a result, the website's traffic ranked first in the Taiwan region among the same competitors.
workAppTitle: Maternal and Infant Tools Application Design
workAppDescription: As the main UX/UI designer, I have been involved in all stages of the project, from user research and ideation to sketching, wireframing, visual design, and prototyping. The goal is to create a user-friendly and engaging app that appeals to users of all ages. The design process emphasizes understanding user insights and pain points to deliver a seamless and intuitive experience.
question: Question
questionDescription: Traditional recording of maternal and infant conditions is done using paper-based methods, which may be convenient and quick but are prone to losing valuable data and difficult to organize. It is also easy to forget to bring the records when seeking medical treatment.
contactNotice: The mobile phone contact for the Taiwan time zone are from 10:00 ~ 17:00. If there is no answer, please use the email. I will reply as soon as possible. Thank you.
